content:
A #new members stream is great for onboarding new members.

If you're reading this and aren't the first person here, introduce yourself in a new thread using your name as the topic! Type c or click on New Topic at the bottom of the screen to start a new topic.
Welcome @Dave Hamill to Zulip!
This should now be showing in your Home area, along with our private messages
you can click on the one that you want to respond to, and then type in the area below

Hi I am Software Engineer, Now a days working in Healthcare. Mr. David referred me to create account here. Thanks Mr. David.
Basic purpose to come here to understand HL7.
Thanks

Hi all, I am Luca Berardinelli, a Software Engineer and former researcher in Model-Driven (Software) Engineering (MDE). I created a channel about RIM. Please, have a look. I am discussing a (common) issue when UML and XMI in general is used to export standards.

Hello! My name is Jeremy Greco and I work for a software company called EMS Consultants Ltd. We are considering trying to implement HL7 standards into our patient care standard and I have been trying to find an XSD template for the latest version of HL7. Can anyone help me with this?
Which HL7 standard are you looking for CDA? Which version?

There's more than one standard for HL7? I thought HL7 was the name of the standard. As far as version I'm looking for whatever the latest version currently is. I understand it to be Version 3. I found a document on the website (http://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/product_brief.cfm?product_id=276) for convertion NEMSIS 3 to HL7 that i've been referencing and at the bottom of that document I see there is an example XML file. I'm looking for an XSD that defines that file or if there is a newer version of it.

Okay, You're doing work with CDA. What you're looking for can be found here: https://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/product_brief.cfm?product_id=7 The CDA set of standards is likely what you want, and you'll want Release 2 (the first download link). That should give you what you need.
Anyone has hl7 ADT41 sample? What does a41 do?

Anyone has hl7 ADT41 sample? What does a41 do?

Suman - that is a HL7 V2 message from the Patient Administation domain. You will want to look at Chapter 3 of the HL7 v2 specification. A41 is the trigger event for a Merging of two account records.

Hi everyone,

Am a software engineer, i want to understand the HL7 standard since we are working in healthcare domain.
So help to make it more knowledge of HL7.

Thanks
